#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zZ[i] <- 0
		zZ[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fZ[i] <- (alphaZ / sZ) * pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ - 1) * exp(-pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ))
		phi[i] <- -log(fZ[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris O3
	alphaZ ~  dunif(0,10)
	sZ ~ dunif(0,200)
}

data
list(z=c(180, 286, 209, 224, 239, 201, 250, 237, 221, 275, 242, 301, 283, 289, 373, 271, 310, 213, 267, 295, 304, 354, 318, 308, 284, 407, 315, 294, 299, 255, 245, 287, 209, 270, 272, 355, 253, 313, 246, 237, 271, 263, 247, 236, 324, 305, 286, 349, 276, 287, 274, 261, 301, 287, 249, 279, 237, 283, 255, 289, 284, 264, 249, 263, 294, 260, 225, 249, 266, 238, 292, 272, 317, 255, 239, 226, 232, 224, 247, 270, 245, 280, 223, 270, 227, 262, 213, 265, 238, 253, 237, 237, 318, 294, 281, 263, 255, 242, 286, 262, 243, 274, 258, 268, 263, 251, 282, 309, 277, 264, 284, 264, 237, 171, 227, 236, 170, 251, 201, 259, 214, 205, 235, 224, 239, 221, 224, 164, 212, 202, 231, 218, 271, 242, 228, 232, 214, 244, 219, 204, 197, 202, 196, 164, 218, 215, 238, 235, 206, 160, 170, 188, 196, 173, 165, 247, 165, 209, 188, 243, 213, 207, 188, 184, 172, 175, 187, 176, 148, 193, 171, 190, 212, 182, 201, 154, 158, 163, 156, 170, 154, 162, 153, 187, 174, 132, 137, 153, 168, 132, 184, 141, 135, 173, 185, 186, 211, 160, 132, 152, 172, 151, 169, 124, 145, 152, 175, 188, 168, 171, 151, 123, 132, 152, 110, 168, 133, 131, 164, 189, 185, 136, 122, 136, 179, 123, 129, 158, 161, 179, 174, 150, 156, 152, 133, 129, 124, 157, 165, 142, 145, 152, 156, 147, 201, 171, 130, 132, 128, 153, 165, 108, 98, 134, 164, 139, 152, 140, 125, 139, 140, 128, 177, 141, 114, 119, 172, 124, 140, 139, 124, 110, 122, 123, 148, 141, 126, 118, 136, 163, 153, 113, 103, 134, 111, 141, 97, 122, 114, 175, 171, 144, 138, 140, 130, 115, 106, 107, 112, 124, 122, 106, 145, 158, 153, 127, 119, 121, 131, 174, 111, 128, 122, 147, 185, 152, 174, 119, 133, 125, 109, 94, 110, 105, 137, 138, 114, 156, 161, 124, 113, 108, 145, 118, 115, 115, 115, 125, 131, 120, 126, 149, 117, 112, 115, 119, 145, 145, 119, 137, 159, 158, 153, 127, 114, 123, 115, 107, 101, 118, 112, 126, 122, 137, 136, 125, 115, 105, 108, 132, 116, 107, 115, 141, 127, 160, 124, 125, 111, 113, 126, 127, 100, 131), N=384)
